rows.label: qst610104_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, Eric's got you hunting
down those thieves, has he?

rows.label: qst610104_msg0002
rows.name:
That's our Eric for you.
When something gets to him,
he doesn't let it go easy.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0003
rows.name:
I know he'd be mad if I hid
anything about this, so I'll
tell you what I know.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0004
rows.name:
Just the other day I saw some shady
types lurking around here. Looked
like they were scoping out the site.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0005
rows.name:
Thinking about it now, they
could easily have been plotting
a theft, you get me?

rows.label: qst610104_msg0006
rows.name: You'll never guess who it was, though.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0007
rows.name: Who was scoping out the site?

rows.label: qst610104_msg0008
rows.name: Nopon

rows.label: qst610104_msg0009
rows.name: Tirkin

rows.label: qst610104_msg0010
rows.name: Superbians

rows.label: qst610104_msg0101
rows.name: Nope.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0102
rows.name:
I won't deny plenty of Nopon
have a love for money, but I
wouldn't peg them as thieves.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0103
rows.name:
No, the ones I saw were
a bunch of Tirkin.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0201
rows.name: Well, I'll be. That's absolutely right.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0202
rows.name:
Yep, it was a bunch of Tirkin
I saw snooping around.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0301
rows.name:
I see your logic there.
Gulan wood is a valuable
commodity in Superbia.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0302
rows.name:
I wouldn't be surprised if
someone resorted to stealing
to get their hands on some.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0303
rows.name:
But I'm afraid you're wrong
this time! The ones I saw
were a bunch of Tirkin.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0401
rows.name:
They're smarter than we give 'em credit
for, those Tirkin. Some can talk, and
they build wooden houses, too.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0402
rows.name:
Kind of makes sense that they'd
be eyeing up the wood here.

rows.label: qst610104_msg0403
rows.name:
Well, I said I'd tell you
all I know and now I have.
Good luck with the rest.
